channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Sunday Best with Fr Groeschel
channel.desc: Father Benedict Groeschel studies the Psalms and offers insights into how best to read them for optimal spiritual growth.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Holy Mass from Knock
channel.desc: Live from Knock, Ireland, celebrate Mass from the pilgrimage site and national shrine known worldwide for the miraculous apparitions in 1879.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Sunday Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate the Holy Sacrifice of the Mass each Sunday from Our Lady of the Angels Chapel.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: The Litany of the Sacred Heart of Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word at the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Alabama.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Grab Your Catechism with Fr. Connor
channel.desc: Fr Connor shares the motives for faith and its benefits.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Chaplet of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: Pray the Chaplet of Divine Mercy.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Great Books Every Catholic Should Know
channel.desc: Joseph Pearce introduces great works of literature that have graced Catholic civilisation over the centuries.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Saving a Man
channel.desc: Church During the Holocaust. Witness the Polish Catholic Church's underground efforts during WWII.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: World Over
channel.desc: Each week, Raymond Arroyo challenges viewers with important political and cultural reporting and analysis of a wide variety of topics.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother reads from Mark 4 and uses the passage where Jesus calms the seas as a meditation on faith.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: The Holy Rosary from Lourdes
channel.desc: Dedicated travellers join together and pray in a devotional ceremony at the Lourdes Grotto in France.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: From The Heart, with Mother Angelica
channel.desc: After they see the Lord's glory in the Transfiguration, the apostles resolve to live only for him.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Vaticano
channel.desc: An in-depth examination of all things Vatican takes viewers around the world in order to explore what is happening in the Catholic Church today.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: St Luke's Gospel
channel.desc: Scripture Scholar Frances Hogan continues her discussion on St Luke's account of the miracle of the Loaves.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Pier Giorgio Frassati
channel.desc: A brief introduction to Blessed Pier Giorgio Frassati, a young man who was known for his devotion and charity.
